byline: Andy Kruse, Dorrie Greenspan, Lynne Rossetto Kasper, Laura Kaliebe, David Leite, Sally Swift and Ken Young
teaser: Turkey Confidential, our annual live call-in show, is over. Thanks to all of our guests: Lidia Bastianich, David Leite, Melissa Clark, Carla Hall, Francis Lam and Henry Alford.
title: Turkey Confidential 2014
